Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

in the far distance, far away; into the far distance; on a distant journey; over a long distance
then, as a rule [examples here need to be cleaned up!!!]

army; section of an army; the members of the army (traditionally 2500 men)

(military or political) strength and influence; effective power

one's family/household in the broadest sense of the term; extended family including retinue and employees, who live together; LY 三家

do everything for; aim to, aspire to; make it one's business, be preoccupied with the task of

conform to, correspond to, be in accordance with
expenditure; cost; expense; lavish use of resources
only then; only after the preceding condition is fulfilled
and so, so, thus; signalling another step in argumentation, with a hardly perceivable causal meaning or without any at all
factor for V-ing; reason for V-ing
命也“it is because of fate": be because of N; be because of the reason N; depend on N
factor which is decisive for N;

by use of vehicles 車載； between carts or vehicles 車裂

variant of 以上: above N; from N upwards
make a reward to (a person); award ritual presents to (someone) in compensation for his services

revise; amend; redefine; try to improve; to make the proper changes to, typically by duly replacing something by a newer version of it

mount, ride in (a carriage, a boat etc); ride on (dragons on the clouds)

this (object of the Vt that follows)

cause to be a living creature; cause to survive; cause to have a good life
commander; who is in charge in commands

method; model (we can say cǐ fǎ 此法 "this method")

[our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

be impressive, be excellent; be the best; be good 甚善
engage in battle, give battle; be professionally engaged in an act of warfare [NB: giving battle is not a vi2. The use of 戰 with two subjects is actually not very common.]
troops, an armed force, armed forces; military force
of higher quality, of superior quality; best
lauch an overt large-scale "punitive" military campaign against

launch an attack (which is not necessarily successful) against; direct attack; assault, personally attack (a person); sometimes used very generally: attack (an opponent, in any way) [The examples have to be distributed into the subcategories below.]
have the same> share in the same, join the same
彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli": N1=class of N2: the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1
method regarding N, method of conducting N

complete (all the parts) together; combine completely together;

fit of anger; small fits of anger, momentary fit of anger
like ants > in a huge amount
cause to get close to N; cause to attach to N

anaphoric: this (particular aforementioned abstract but definite) item
N1=environment: 塗巷之人 "a man from the streets" N2 coming from N1 and having features characteristic of the environment N1
OBI 5: calamity; disaster (from Heaven/Nature; occasionally self-inflicted as in CC 9.1); the reference is sometimes to a fire
SS, 行之節也 “..., this is the rhythm of traveling [by chariot]"

seg.line: 屈人之兵而非戰也，拔人之城而非攻也，

屈人之兵而非戰也，拔人之城而非攻也，
屈人之兵而非戰也，拔人之城而非攻也，

tls:line.title: Sun Tzu or the Art of War

tls:text.tls:line: it is not because they have a distaste for riches;

sense.def: it is not that S (but...); it is not because of S; it is not as if S (but...)

tls:text.tls:line: it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.SUN

sense.def: it is not that S (but...); it is not because of S; it is not as if S (but...)
